Your sword is finely made by Shin, the legendary swordsmith.

  • When you Strike using your blade you may choose to forgo your stat bonus for the roll. If you do so, on a hit, mark progress thrice (instead of just twice).
  • When you Sojourn, people recognize your blade, add +the amount of points on this asset.
  • When you Battle, treat a miss as a weak hit and a weak hit as a strong hit.
